summary: This is an FBI criminal history record response from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services to an inquiry, indicating that the subject has DNA not in CODIS and should have DNA collected. The document contains identification and criminal history sections but no fingerprint or photo images were transmitted.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: He is listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency providing the FBI record response.

events.title: FBI Record Response
events.description: The FBI provided a criminal history record response to an inquiry from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St. Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The document is an FBI criminal history record response dated October 6, 2021.
The record indicates the subject has DNA not in CODIS and DNA should be collected.
No fingerprint images or photo images were transmitted with this record.
The record is based on fingerprint comparisons and pertains to a single individual.
The use of the record is regulated by law and provided for official use only.
